name: Turbo Grid
summary:
In a far distant future, racing has evolved into a whole new dimension. Super fast space ships replaced traditional vehicles and gone all the known roads with new kind of challenge on a deep space racing track. It's dangerous as well, so are you up to this challenge?
Turbo Grid is a fast paced racing / shooting experience setup in a ray like race track. Your aim is to go as far as you can with simply tapping each side of the screen to dodge from the obstacles. Your ship is fast, but becomes faster with speed up sections during the race. You should also collect gun item to get shooting capability in order to clean your way. Shield item can be usefull to collect as it'll help you in any of your dodge mistake. Boost takes your ship's speed into another level where you can fly over many obstacles at a glance. Orbs are the currency in this future, so collect them as much as you can and also a magnet item can help you ease in this purpose.
